creator: martin.dominguez@wbsgo.com
text:
- Internet Explorer (since IE6)
   When I try to save changes thah I did in a document, It shows a message wich says that if I want continue, document will be blocked (cheked-out)

- Firefox 3.5
   If there are strong or em tags, when I save this tags disappear. So I can't use bold nor italic letters.

creator: rainer.schoepf@gmx.net
text:
Which version of TinyMCE is this? TinyMCE 2 explicitly replaces strong and em tags by b and i, respectively, when it detects Firefox or any other Gecko-based browser. Since b and i are not valid tags, the cleanup code removes them. You can verify this by clicking on the cleanup button.

TinyMCE 3 works for me. Can you please try 3.3.8 ? 

  Rainer

creator: martin.dominguez@wbsgo.com
text:
Hi Rainer,

I'm using TinyMCE 2 because I thought version 3 was not supported by Lenya. I'll try version 3.3.8.

Thanks for your answer.

Greeting. 

Martín.-

creator: rainer.schoepf@gmx.net
text:
Hi Martín,

you are right, TinyMCE 3.0 did not work correctly. 

If 3.3.8 works for you, you might try the patches in

  https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=49580

to hide image and table properties that are not allowed in xhtml strict.

 Rainer

creator: rainer.schoepf@gmx.net
text: lenya 2.0.4 will support TinyMCE 3.x instead of 2.x.
